ruleBookInfo.init:
<js>
x=JSON.parse(source.getVariable()).page;
x=x?x:0;
 if (baseUrl.match(/novel/)){
name=`{{@@class.novel_box@class.info_box@tag.h1.0@text}}`
author=`{{@@class.novel_box@class.info_box@class.item.1@a@text}}`
kind=`{{book.kind}}`
word=`{{book.wordCount}}`
last=`{{@@class.novel_box@class.info_box@class.item.0@text##æœ€æ–°ï¼š}}`

try {
    const response = java.ajax(`{{getUrl()}}api/novel/app/novel/comments?novelId=@get:{bid}&sortType=1&page=${x}&rows=10`);
    const jsonData = JSON.parse(response);
    const logOutput = jsonData.data.map(comment => {
        const cleanNickName = comment.updateTime.replace(/T/g,'  ').replace(/\..*/g, '');
        // æ ¹æ®åˆ†æ•°ç”Ÿæˆæ˜Ÿæ˜Ÿæ˜¾ç¤º
        const generateStars = (score) => {
            let starCount = Math.min(Math.floor(score / 2), 5);
            let stars = '';
            for (let i = 0; i < 5; i++) {
                stars += i < starCount? 'â˜…' : 'â˜†';
            }
            return stars;
        };
        const starDisplay = generateStars(comment.score);
        return `
  â±ï¸ [${cleanNickName}]  ${comment.createTimeFormat}
â›„ã€${comment.nickName}ã€‘ï¼šğŸ‘ğŸ»${comment.score} ${starDisplay}
 ğŸ’¬  ${comment.content}
 \n­
 
`;
    }).join('\n');
    //java.log(logOutput);
} catch (error) {
    const errorLog = {
        [SyntaxError.name]: 'æ•°æ®è§£æå¤±è´¥: ',
        default: 'AJAXè¯·æ±‚å¤±è´¥: '
    }[error.name || 'default'] + error.message;
    java.log(errorLog);
}
info = ` 
ğŸ“– ä¹¦åï¼š{{@@class.novel_box@class.info_box@tag.h1.0@text}}
ğŸ‘¤ ä½œè€…ï¼š{{@@class.novel_box@class.info_box@class.item.1@a@text}}
ğŸ“œ ç¯‡å¹…ï¼š{{@@class.props_box@tag.ul@li.1@text}}
ğŸ”– æ ‡ç­¾ï¼š{{@@class.tag_box@li[0:-3]@a@text##\n}}
ğŸ—¿ è‚‰é‡ï¼š{{@@class.props_box@ul@li.0@text}}
âœ  è¯„åˆ†ï¼š{{@@class.score_box@span@text}}
ğŸ•° æœ€æ–°ï¼š{{@@class.novel_box@class.info_box@class.item.0@text##æœ€æ–°ï¼š}}
ğŸ‘ è§‚çœ‹ï¼š{{@@class.props_box@ul@li.2@text}}
â¤ï¸ æ”¶è—ï¼š{{@@class.props_box@ul@li.3@text}}
ğŸ· ç®€ä»‹ï¼š{{@@class.ellipsis@text##å°è¯´ç®€ä»‹ï¼š}}`;
intro=info+`\n­\nã€âœ¨è¯„è®ºâœ¨ã€‘æœ€æ–°\n­${logOutput}`
info=logOutput?intro:info
}else if(baseUrl.match(/comic/)){
	 name=`{{book.name}}`,
		author=`{{book.author}}`,
		kind=`{{book.kind}}`,
		word=``,
		last=``,
		info=` 
ğŸ“– ä¹¦åï¼š{{book.name}}
ğŸ‘¤ ä½œè€…ï¼š{{book.author}}
ğŸ· ç®€ä»‹ï¼š{{book.intro}}`;
	}else if (baseUrl.match(/video/)) {
		name=`{{$.model.title}}`
		author=`{{$.model.keywords}}`
		kind=`{{$..tags}}`
		word=``
		last=``
		info=`{{$..brief}}`
		}else if (baseUrl.match(/audio/)) {
   name=`{{$.model.title}}`
		author=`{{$.model.authors}}`
		kind=`{{java.getString('.finished')==1?"å®Œç»“":"è¿è½½"}},{{$..categories}}`
		word=``
		last=`{{$..latestUpdate}}`
		info=`{{$..brief}}`
}
data = {
    name: name,
    author: author,
    kind: kind,
    word:word,
    last: last,
    info: info
};

JSON.stringify(data);
</js>

 if (baseUrl.match(/novel/)){
'{{getUrl()}}novel/intro?id={{$.id}}'

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
 if (baseUrl.match(/novel/)){
 book.type = 8;
 var data = [];
var list = java.getElements(".catalog_ul li");
var n = src.match(/catalog_ul[^\(]+.*-n.*(\d+)\)/) ? parseInt(src.match(/catalog_ul[^\(]+.*-n.*(\d+)\)/)[1]) : 0;
var m = list.length;
var k = /menu/.test(list) && /å±•å¼€ç« èŠ‚/.test(list) ? 1 : 0;
//java.log(n)
//java.log(n+'/'+m+'/'+k);
for (i in list) {
    if (i >= m - n ) {break}
    var list_i = /img/.test(list[i].select("span")[0]) ? list[i].select("span")[0] : list[i].select("a");
    data.push({
        title: String(list_i.text()).replace(/^\s+|\snew/g, ""),
        link: /img/.test(list[i].select("span")[0]) ? "" : `${getUrl()}${list[i].select("a").attr("href")}`,
        time: /img/.test(list[i].select("span")[0])  ? "" : String(list[i].select("span").text()).replace(/æ¸¸å®¢/g,'æ¸¸å®¢âœ¨').replace(/å¸/g,'ğŸ’°').replace(/new\s/g,'').replace(/æ³¨å†Œä¼šå‘˜/g,'VIPğŸ’'),
        vol: /img/.test(list[i].select("span")[0]) ? true : false,
        vip: /å¸/.test(list[i].select("span")[0]) ? true : false
    });
}
data;
 }else if (baseUrl.match(/comic/)) {
	book.type = 64;
 var data=[]
var list = java.getElements(".catalog_ul li");
var n = src.match(/catalog_ul[^\(]+.*-n.*(\d+)\)/) ? parseInt(src.match(/catalog_ul[^\(]+.*-n.*(\d+)\)/)[1]) : 0;
var m = list.length;
var k = /menu/.test(list) && /å±•å¼€ç« èŠ‚/.test(list) ? 1 : 0;
//java.log(n+'/'+m+'/'+k);
for (i in list) {
    if (i >= m - n -k ) {break}
    var list_i = /img/.test(list[i].select("span")[0]) ? list[i].select("span")[0] : list[i].select("a");
    data.push({
        title: String(list_i.text()).replace(/^\s+|\snew/g, ""),
        link: /img/.test(list[i].select("span")[0]) ? "" : `${getUrl()}${list[i].select("a").attr("href")}`,
        time: /img/.test(list[i].select("span")[0])  ? "" : String(list[i].select("span").text()).replace(/æ¸¸å®¢/g,'æ¸¸å®¢âœ¨').replace(/å¸/g,'ğŸ’°').replace(/new\s/g,'').replace(/æ³¨å†Œä¼šå‘˜/g,'VIPğŸ’'),
        vol: /img/.test(list[i].select("span")[0]) ? true : false,
        vip: /å¸/.test(list[i].select("span")[0]) ? true : false
    });
}
data;
	}else if (baseUrl.match(/video/)) {
    book.type = 8;
    //java.toast('å½“å‰ä¸ºè§†é¢‘æ¨¡å¼ğŸ§¾');
  var data = []
    name=java.getString('{$..title}')
    href=`${getUrl()}api/video/app/video/intro?force=false&id=`+java.getString('{$.model.id}')+`&viewId=`+new Date().getTime() + Math.round(Math.random() * (9999 - 1000) + 1000);

 data.push({
    	title:name,
    	link:href	  		
    });
 data
  }else if (baseUrl.match(/audio/)) {
    book.type = 32;
    //java.toast('å½“å‰ä¸ºå¬ä¹¦æ¨¡å¼ğŸ§¾');
    var data = []
    name=java.getString('{$..title}')
    href=`${getUrl()}api/audio/app/audio/chapter?force=false&id=`+java.getString('{$..latestReadChapterId}')+`&offset=0&viewId=`+new Date().getTime() + Math.round(Math.random() * (9999 - 1000) + 1000);
 data.push({
    	title:name,
    	link:href	  		
    });
 data

    
}
 </js>
